content:
Matys Hoffman said
Could you please let me know if there’s a way to: Force an existing POP account to switch to IMAP, Or safely recreate the account as IMAP without losing local data and without Thunderbird freezing during setup?

1. No.

2. The new Account Hub has some bugs - try creating the new IMAP account the old way:

- go to TB menu > Settings > General > Account hub > uncheck 'Create accounts in the new Account Hub'

- go to TB menu > New Account > Email

Once it's created and you confirm it's working OK, delete the POP account.

content: It’s smart to be cautious if the upgrade screen looks unusual and asks for your password. It could be legitimate, but to be safe, try upgrading via the terminal with `sudo apt update` and `sudo apt upgrade` to avoid suspicious pop-ups. If the screen still seems off, don’t enter your password and cancel the upgrade. Always trust your instincts with password requests.
creator: sanjay210no

content:
The screen is legitimate, and appears when TB is first installed. It can also appear in an existing setup if TB has lost the location of the profile and acts like a new install. Usually, this is due to a corrupted prefs.js.file:

https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1489403

content: You need to assign the email address the invitation is sent to to your Google Calendar. Also remove that email address from your Home calendar. Open a Calendar tab, and right-click a calendar in the left pane - Properties. Select the desired email from the drop-down menu.

content:
Per poter inquadrare il problema prova a fornire queste informazioni:

  1. Versione di Thunderbird
  2. Versione del sistema operativo
  3. Provider delle caselle email (Gmail, Libero, Hotmail, etc.)
  4. Tipologia di account (POP3, IMAP)
  5. Estensioni installate
  6. Messaggi di errore che vengono visualizzati durante l'utilizzo di Thunderbird
  7. Software di sicurezza eventualmente presenti (Antivirus e simili)
  8. Screenshot del problema (se utile a chiarire il contesto)

content: I am confusing you and I apologize. IMAP syncs to the server, but thunderbird downloads to PC for the user's access. So, the message is on the PC and can be accessed when downloaded. If the message is deleted from server, the copy on PC is deleted also. This is how IMAP works, and is not unique to Thunderbird. So, if there's ever message you want to preserve, but remove from the account, COPY it first to local folders.

content:
Tohle je známý problém s „nekonečným hledáním konfigurace“ v Thunderbirdu se objevuje dost často, hlavně po aktualizaci nebo když se něco pokazí v autodetekci účtu. 🧭 Tady je návod, jak to obejít a přidat účet ručně: ---
  1. 🧰 1️⃣ Spusť ruční nastavení účtu
1. Otevři Thunderbird. 2. Jdi na **Nástroje → Nastavení účtů → Akce účtu → Přidat poštovní účet** (nebo: **☰ Menu → Nový → Existující e-mailový účet**). 3. Zadej **jméno, e-mail a heslo**, ale **neklikej hned na „Pokračovat“**. 4. Místo toho klikni na **„Ruční konfigurace“ (Manual config)** dole. ---
  1. ⚙️ 2️⃣ Vyplň údaje ručně
Podle typu účtu (např. Gmail, Seznam, Outlook…) zadej hodnoty:
  1. 📩 Gmail (IMAP)
  • Příchozí server: `imap.gmail.com`, port **993**, SSL/TLS, ověření **OAuth2**
  • Odchozí server: `smtp.gmail.com`, port **465**, SSL/TLS, ověření **OAuth2**
  • Uživatelské jméno: celá e-mailová adresa
  1. 📩 Seznam.cz
  • Příchozí: `imap.seznam.cz`, port **993**, SSL/TLS
  • Odchozí: `smtp.seznam.cz`, port **465**, SSL/TLS
  • Uživatelské jméno: celá e-mailová adresa
  1. 📩 Outlook/Hotmail
  • IMAP: `outlook.office365.com`, port **993**, SSL/TLS
  • SMTP: `smtp.office365.com`, port **587**, STARTTLS
  • Ověření: OAuth2 nebo „Normální heslo“ (podle účtu)
---
  1. 🧹 3️⃣ Pokud se to pořád kousne:
Zkus ještě tyto kroky:
  • Zavři Thunderbird.
  • Najdi složku profilu (Windows: `C:\Users\<tvoje_jméno>\AppData\Roaming\Thunderbird\Profiles\...`)
  • Smaž soubor **cert9.db** a **key4.db** (vytvoří se znovu, pomáhá to, když je poškozený certifikát).
  • Potom Thunderbird znovu spusť a zkus přidání ručně.
---
  1. 🧱 4️⃣ Nouzový režim Thunderbirdu
Spusť ho v **nouzovém režimu bez doplňků**:
  • podrž **Shift** při spouštění → zvol **„Spustit v nouzovém režimu“**.
Pokud tam přidání účtu funguje, je problém v nějakém doplňku. ---

content: There can be several reasons for downloading issues, but one factor that might cause them is having too short a time between server polling. Set the interval to 10 min. instead of 1 min. and see if it helps. If the account is IMAP and the server supports instant notifications, mail will be downloaded anyway as soon as it arrives at the server.

content: Please share the email domain you use and a screenshot of your 'copies&folders' pane that shows what your Sent folder settings are. to delete a large number of contacts, highlight one, with left mouse key down, drag mouse down to highlight as many as desired to delete, rightclick and select 'delete' To upload the csv, do this: Create single good email address in the addressbook - highlight the addressbook, click the three dots to the right and download a csv file. This is now your template - load the csv into a spreadsheet and note the top row. that shows thunderbird's layout - now, load the outlook csv into the spreadsheet software and adjust the columns and top row to mirror the thunderbird sample - save as csv and this will now import properly.

I created a new (very small) backup file using MozBackup. I watched where the file went and it was the same format as the one I had from April 2025. I did a restore using the April 2025 one and everything came back. YEH!!!

So, if you have not done so, use MozBackup to backup your Thunderbird on regular basis and put it somewhere safe.
